entry.title: Hello Octopress
entry.content:
Hello to my new and AWESOME Octopress Blog.

(Post being updating)

How it has been my experience with Octopress ?!

Installation

At first was a little hard, besause when I started to read the offcial Octopress Documentation and my experience with Ruby was none.

So...I failed at my first installation.

Why?! What I have done wrong in following the steps?!

Well...in my notebook I use Fedora as my primary OS. For someone with none Ruby experience the official documentation doesn't help very much. And for my pleasure, when I follow all the steps using the Ruby tool rbenv didn't worked in my installation.

After a little Google search, I found this link explaining how to start the Octopress installation with tool rvm. And then I could proceed to the next step of the official documentation.

Deployment

In this step I choose to make the Deploying to Github Pages process with my Github User (without the custom domains option).
